item.title: A Walk Down St. Laurent Blvd., Montreal
item.description:
A Walk Down St. Laurent Blvd., Montreal

Baharak and I like to pick a neighbourhood, somewhere in and around our hometown of Montreal, and spend the day like a tourist. We explore, wander, try a coffee shop or pub and spend an afternoon getting to know a local spot. Last week we decided on a visit to one of Montreal's most famous streets, St.

item.title: Getting Started with The Grid
item.description:
Getting Started with The Grid

a little introduction - kicking off a new platform, one where I'll share tidbits on travel and building a Lifestyle business.
